I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/typeddjango/django-stubs.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official Python image
FROM python:3.10

# Set the working directory in the container
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository to the container
COPY . /app/

# Install the development requirements
RUN pip install -r requirements.txt

# Run tests to confirm installation was successful
RUN pytest
